thread.title: Rainbow Six Siege trailer introduces Germany’s GSG-9
thread.title_full: Rainbow Six Siege trailer introduces Germany’s GSG-9

author: News Zombie
title: Rainbow Six Siege trailer introduces Germany’s GSG-9
text:
Posted on October 12, 2015 in PC News , PlayStation 4 News , Xbox One News 
Ubisoft has released the fourth installment of their Inside Rainbow series for Rainbow Six Siege. The latest video showcases the elite German counterterrorism unit GSG-9. In the game, players will lead a four-man squad comprised of operators Bandit, Blitz, I.Q., and Jager. The crew will have access to a projectile-destroying device, a mini-flashbang-deploying shield, and an instrument that can electrify defenses. 
Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six Siege is scheduled to launch on December 1 for PC, PS4, and Xbox One. 
–
